I love me some Amazon.com.Practically anything one could think of to purchase can be found here and for us serious shoppers that's as close to heaven you'll come to here on earth.Everything I've ordered from Amazon has always been delivered before the estimated time and has arrived in perfect condition.I must earmark this message since it will probably be the only positive one I'll write.Isn't that a shame that we have a myriad of slip-shod sites to chose from and so few jewels?

I have ordered many items from amazon.com over the years. They are dependable and have great prices. I have also ordered from the amazon marketplace and have gotten even better deals on occasion than what amazon's offering price for an item was. On eof the best things about this site is that they offer reviews on their items from the consumer so you can get an idea of what real people think of the item you plan on purchasing. This can be especially helpful if you are buying household or electronics of any kind. These reviews have made a difference as to whether or not I purchased an item. I have never had a bad experience with this site and will continue to utilize it for my shopping needs.Great site!!!

It's my favorite place to buy anything online. Extremely well put together site. I've spent more money on amazon than all the other sites combined. I've shopped with them for around 8 years. Pretty much anything you could want shopping wise you can order it on amazon. E-books, mp3's, digital games, android apps, clothes, books, cd's, furniture, etc. They have lately been pushing much harder into the digital distribution area with their mp3's and their cloud service. Like I said, my favorite place to shop.

I have been very satisfied with Amazon. I have bought Christmas gifts for my family and electronics for myself. I bought a Kindle and so far have been able to read for 0 dollars because they have so many out-of-copyright books. I had to return an item once that I bought by mistake and it went very smoothly. The shipping has mostly been free and the prices better than competitive.

Did you ever wonder why this site is the No. 1 on-line retailer? It has to be because they make sure the customer is satisfied. You have a problem? Contact them and its taken care of. That also happens to be the only area where you might run into a problem since they outsource their help to some Third World country where the help is apparently reading from a script if you call, and just send you a scripted comment if you write. Sometimes it won't even have a thing to do with your problem! This is the one area Amazon needs to improve upon. Otherwise, I can find items there I can't find elsewhere at a decent price - and always make sure to order at least $25 worth of stuff so I don't get stuck with paying shipping. No complaints about the service - I seem to order at least $100 worth of stuff from them per month. Now.....if they'd just quit inundating people with ads for their Kindle - its the first thing you see when you go to the site - enough already!!
LOVE this site! Order anything I can from it--so easy, and the free shipping over $25 is amazing!
They are top rated. Their products and service is beyond outstanding. When I had a problem with 2 purchases at two different times, They made good even though the sellers did not.
Recently bought LA Noire from here, great price! Never had any issues will recommend to anyone.
I just really love Amazon! just started on here and haven't ordered anything in a while but you know - just wanted to say how much I love it!
Best selection on the web. Low Prices.

I am a huge book lover and I always use Amazon to order back titles, classics and any new releases. I am not really a fan of most modern literature so I am lucky they have a big range of options from the middle American history which in my opinion is the most vibrant literary period. Sometimes you find products listed on the site which are not sold directly by Amazon, mostly these are second hand books so watch out for that but normally it is really clear. Obviously the shipping varies because it depends where the seller is located, so if you need your book fast then order direct from the main website. What I really need to praise is the customer service. I bought a book and the post service messed up so it got sent back and the order was automatically refunded. When I went back to order it again (not Amazon's fault, right?) the price was higher. I emailed them and they agreed to sell me the book at the original price I would have paid. I don't know if they always do that but their service was awesome!
Have never been dissapointed in this site.. Items are exactly as offered, and ship very fast. You can get almost anything here.Definitely not just for books and CD's.

What can you say about Amazon...it is the gold standard for on-line shopping. Everything about them is superior. Consider becoming a "Prime" member. For $79.95 a year (that's $6.66 a month) - everything you buy (that Amazon fulfills) will be 2 day shipping FREE. With this feature, I don't bother to go out in the 100 degree weather here in Texas to buy something at Target...I order it from Amazon....and its here in 2 days !!
Good shipping rates, reliable customer service, always responds to inquiries.

- If you're a student or a mom, sign up for free Amazon Prime. The free shipping has made me extremely happy with Amazon and extremely unhappy when other companies fail to match Amazon's level of shipping service. - Check out prices elsewhere when you want to buy something - most of the time you'll come right back to Amazon. If you want electronics, I highly recommend sticking to either Amazon or Newegg.
Great website great products speedy delivery
I never had any problem with amazon. It's my favorite site. I only order from other websites when I can't find the item in amazon.

I've been a customer for over 10 years.. and I've never had a bad experience. This is simply the best site to buy anything they are selling. The prices are very good, not always the best. You might get better deals on other sites, but its much more convenient to not have to create new accounts with other vendors, enter my credit card info, and possibly get sketchy service. I can look up what I am looking to purchase, read reviews to make sure I'm getting the best in class product, click and buy. Easy. Best of all it is at my door in 2 days (sometimes one) with Prime. No joke - I would say 90% of my discretionary spending is on amazon, from my TV and coffee maker to my underwear and socks. Also the customer service and return policy is great. My only gripe is that since I moved to New York I now have to pay sales tax.

I have consistently received my items from Amazon earlier than noted in my confirming which I think is an added bonus. I have yet to be unable to find something I wanted on their site. It's truly incredible that I can now get everything I've ever wanted online!
Bought a movie. A little bit of a shipping delay from back order or something, but was communicated right away. Thanks for getting me those hard to find movies that stores never have!

Got to love Amazon. After my ebay account got hacked and paypal took it out on me, I moved to Amazon and really enjoy the products and the service. The reviews there are very helpful and the ratings accurate.

As a buyer on Amazon.com I must say it is a great site. While buying on amazon you can sometime find a great deal. If buy some items from them directly as oppose to buying from sellers you have the chance of receiving the items within days of the purchase.  I must say to some point it becomes addictive due to their great quick and reliable services. Some special offers and discounts due come in from time to time that makes shopping at amazon a must.

I love Amazon. Just about everything you would want is on here. I have only had to complain one time and they fixed it immediately. basically I pre-ordered a game and received it as promised. A week later it was $20 cheaper. I wasnt happy so i sent an email. Two days later i had $20 credit on my account. The prime membership is the way to go, i am a student so i got mine free. Most everything arrives in two days thanks to my prime membership.  Roughly 50 orders over the last few years and am super happy with Amazon!
nunca imaginé todo lo que podría encontrar a la venta ahí, es asombroso como las ventas en internet han aumentado considerablemente.

I have never had a bad experience with Amazon. Customer service is terrific, they always respond promptly and they are very helpful. I have also bought from individual sellers and so far, my experiences have been good. They also tend to have great prices, especially when it comes to books. If you're a student, you might like their student program, in which they offer discounts on clothing and other items just for students. This program has been great for me, as you get free shipping benefits the first year. These are usually part of the Prime membership (which is not free, about $79 a year last time I checked). However, if you're a regular buyer, the price could be worth it.

I have been buying books from Amazon for the past three years or more. I never cease to be amazed at the breadth and speed of service. I buy mostly non-fiction titles and their options of new and second-hand offers is utterly comprehensive. The same service is available for a wide variety of other items and always my satisfaction has been 100%. On the odd occasion when mistakes have been made (by me as well as Amazon) they are quickly rectified without cost to me.

I've been an Amazon shopper since 2002 and spend quite a bit there on everything from food to $1800 diamond earrings to a lawnmower and generator. I've purchased incredible bargains and some not so hot, but that was my choice since Amazon did not make the item! My customer service interactions have been fair to excellent, mostly quite good. You must remember and honor their 30 day return rule for easy and swift returns' refund. As long as any seller shown on Amazon's site is part of the Amazon guarantee program, they really will act on your behalf to correct the issue or provide a full refund which I was pleased to experience. They will refund or replace if food is expired or there is some other legitimate reason. Sadly they have really cut back on the Friday Gold box deals, but then now I don't impulse buy as much either. I visit there everyday and can find just about everything I need or at least a link to an external site.

I go to amazon.com for just about anything that I need, however, books are the thing that I buys the most of. I can always get what I am looking for no matter when it was published or how old or how long out of print it is. The best prices, too! Joe W.

I love Amazon.com. I have had a lot of experience dealing with them. I purchase maybe $2000 a year of products from them. They are always quick and they have lots of hard to find items. I love reading the reviews on their site.  Once a $100 item never came to my home. They said it was delivered. I contacted them and told them I didn't get it. They sent another one out without any questions. I couldn't believe it. They were so nice and professional. I also get free shipping because I'm a prime member because I bought textbooks from them for college, which were cheaper than my school's bookstore. As long as they don't change then I will always be a happy customer.

I cannot say enough good things about Amazon. I am signed up for Amazon Mom and order all of my diapers through their Subscribe and Save program online. With Amazon Mom, you receive free 2-day air shipping on ALL orders, whether they are child-related or not!
Everytime my order was arrived timely and in great shape
Excellent service and product choice!

I've been an amazon.com member for years, and a Prime member since inception of the program. Their prices are almost always the lowest, and I can always find what I'm looking for. The search is sometimes a little convoluted, but low prices and 2 day shipping are hard to beat!
Amazon is still the gold standard in online shopping. Sure, it's not perfect, but it's the best large-scale internet shopping site experience available here in 2011.

I've got the new kindle.  I love it!  Amazon.com has been a great tool for me.  I can't imagine going to the bookstore and buying another book.   If you get the chance check out the Kindle and Amazon.com

Love the site. I was looking for a song dated by to 1998 and could not find it anywhere. Amazon had it. Also, I've searched for old movies and my daughter orders a lot of her school books from them. Love you "Amazon" keep up the good work.
I can always find what I need on this website. Received a Kindle for a gift. I love it, and Amazon makes it so easy to download and manage my library, unlike ITunes.

Amazon is a great place to buy almost anything. I must admit that it is mainly books that I buy from them but my wife buys almost anything (curtains, excercise bikes, software, dvds). It is very easy to use (perhaps to easy) with your shopping being divided into several departments. As for books. It probably has about 99% of all books available and it is interactive so you can leave a review of any books you buy. Overall - essential.

My son wanted a toy at Target, but I told him to wait until he saved his money. Once he saved his money I took him back to Target, but the toy had been discontinued. My son was heartbroken, and he worked so hard at saving up for the toy. Fortunately Amazon had a used version. I ordered the toy and it arrived exactly when they said it would. The bonus is that it was half the price compared to when it was in the store. I highly recommend Amazon.com

Amazon.com - what more can I say about it that hasn't been said already? I've been buying items from Amazon since 2003 and have never, not once, had a negative experience. I realize that now, with the various sellers, there's some more risk, but I tend to avoid those and go straight for the items sold by Amazon. And now that I own a Kindle.

LOVE amazon! Been shopping there for years. Great place to buy books, I've even sold a couple of text books there and got more than I could from the school bookstore even with the amzaon fee, I use it a lot to check out reviews before I buy products even if I don't buy them there...just can't say enough about it! I also have auto order set up for diapers and wipes and get the CHEAP with the auto order discount plus the amazon mom discount and FREE shipping:) Also joined amazon student for free shipping for a year. Great place to find discontinued and hard to find items...bought a 3 pack of my favorite face powder for cheap after I couldn't find it in stores. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!
Ordered many times. Never had a problem.
Ilove them, secure, fast and you can get anything there. I do most of my internet shopping here. Great deals !!!

I love this site. I order probably 90% of online shopping (which I do frequently) thru amazon. I have had a free prime membership for a year because I order diapers with them and I love that they usually have 20% off diapers in the parenting magazines since their diapers are already pretty cheap compared to most stores.  During the holidays, an item I ordered was delivered according to UPS but I never received and amazon sent out a new item OVERNIGHT with no questions asked. Not sure if it's because I order from them a lot or what but I was kind of surprised by their quick response since it was obviously not their fault that UPS delivered to the wrong house.

Excellent selections. Excellent Service. Amazon has made our providing computer services a whole lot easier over the last few years. I'd have to honest say that They are cheapest 90 - 95% of the time we price shop. Better yet, we are PRIME customers. For only $69.00 (or so) a year, we get free 2nd say shipping or for $3.99 get overnight shipping. Regardless the size or weight. We are probably placing 10-15 orders per week, and to be frank, I know they are losing money on us when it comes to the PRIME account. But they have no limit. As far a 3rd party purchases, I have on occasion had a problem with the 3rd party vendor. In every case it only took 1 email to Amazon and I got a refund within hours. As far as the reviewer complaining about Amazon selling so much more than books ... that really is a silly complaint. If you are searching, you can specify to ONLY search books. Come on, if it bothers you that much, then go buy your books at Barnes and Noble ... and pay more. In our case, about 98% or all purchases are NOT books. Seriously, what's NOT to like about Amazon. On a scale of 1 to 10, they are a clear 10 for me and our business.

I've ordered hundreds of times over the last five or six years and have always been satisfied. I especially appreciate how they really work to get holiday gifts delivered on time. The only thing less than perfect is that it's challenging to get a phone number and a human to talk to but otherwise, they are way better than any other site I've dealt with.

The BEST site for ordering items around. Hastle free returns, trusted ordering. Makes ordering online easy. Just be careful, because some of the links send you to another website, and then you are no longer ordering through Amazon itself... but otherwise you are good-to-go.
I've bought many items on Amazon and my experience with all of them has been positive. I would buy again.
Best site ever. I find everything that I need there :)

Although Amazon has expanded to being a middleman of sorts selling such things as whole fresh rabbit, shaving oil and hungarian paprika - they're still good for your basics: books and music. I've never received a wrong item from them and have had amazingly good experiences with the merchants selling used books. It can be annoying to browse for certain items, like trying to look for a diary with a day per page but their suggested items are very helpful and I sometimes end up buying more than I wanted, which isn't a bad thing - $25 and free shipping is always great! I think the trick in buying used books is to look at the individual sellers' feedback - it's ebay-esque. Their music downloads sometimes are $1 or $2 cheaper than iTunes and they often have $5 album deals.

I love how you can go there and find just so much variety on, well... everything. They certainly make it easy to see a ton of choices on whatever you need and pick out the best deals. Also there are customer reviews on so many of the books and products. Perfect.
You can buy here anything, it is excellent. Product selection is perfect, even with clothes.
excellent site, fast delivery and good selection...Recomended.
When buying everything from textbooks to hard to find cleaning supplies I may look other places, but I usually end up back at Amazon.com. As a student, I have free two day shipping for a year!

I have always had great experiences with Amazon. You can find a ton of deals and just about anything you can think of. The marketplace allows you to find deals at the lowest price available. The site is user friendly and their customer service is about average for that type of site.

Little more needs to be said. I am an Amazon Prime member for over a year. Great quick shipping. I have returned expensive electronics, no questions asked or disputed. No shipping costs on return. I will pay an extra dollar to buy from Amazon. Not one of their outside sellers, tho. You take your choice and your chances with their outside seller.
Amazon is awesome. They even ship to deployed units using APO addresses which is cool. I've never had a problem and I have been shopping with them for a couple of years now.
I love amazon! I shop for almost everything!

i was very impressed with the easy navigation on the site as well as the quick delivery. I ordered my friend who is expecting a few baby books & they literally arrived the next day! I was so impressed when my friend called to say thanks. I thought it would at least take 2-3 days. Efficient service :)

I have purchased various products at amazon from books, magazines, shoes, clothes, outdoor gear, and even an imac. I have always been impressed with their quick shipping. You can also avoid shipping charges though various amazon promotions. If you do purchase something and then change your mind about needing the product you will be stuck with return shipping, but to me is understandable.

I have ordered merchandise, both new and used from Amazon.com many, many, many times over the past few years....everything from movies to shoes to aquarium supplies and have always been pleased with the service and speed of delivery.

My Husband and I order from Amazon all the time the prices are great and the shipping is very reasonable and you can always get any information you need on refunds and returns and such. I highly recommend this site for anyone buying online!

I've been ordering items off Amazon for the past 6 years, and I have yet to have a bad experience with them (knock on wood). Eveything to college textbooks to TVs, it all been hassle-free. Granted there are times when items aren't shipped out as fast as Amazon says they will be, but if it's going to be late, Amazon has always sent me emails explaining it will be late.  The trick to making the smaller purchases worth it, like one reviewer stated, is to order $25 worth of stuff in a single order to qualify for the free shipping. You have to wait a few extra days most of the time, but if you can put up with the wait, it ends up being a good deal. My one complaint (annoyance really) about Amazon are the fluctuating prices. I've seen item prices start at a specific amount drop by $50, then jump up by $75, only to drop by $60. All in a single week. My opinion: if you're considering purchasing something large at Amazon, watch the price for a few days before you buy it. Nothing is more annoying than a price dropping $50 a day after you buy the item. Overall a great site to buy from!
I've bought from amazon a lot of things. Never ever has a transaction gone bad. Love them!

The site is great! It offers good items with great prices. And it provides a safe environment for customers if the products and orders are fulfilled by Amazon directly. Sellers in general try to provide good customer satisfaction because otherwise they may get a bad rating. In general it has been a good experience purchasing from amazon. And if there is a problem, chances are that you can get a refund. One cool thing I like from amazon is that it offers product reviews and at the same time in some cases you can see what customers buy more often among related products of your interest. This helps to make knowledgeable decisions before buying. Best regards ! :)

This site is the best! I look here to figure out fair prices for my business, get ideas, and just browse. It is my "window shopping" while I recover from surgery. I love it! Amazon is top notch.

has everything i need and delivery everything very quickly!

I love Amazon. It so much more than just books now. I've purchased boots, drug store type items, food items, electronics, kitchen items and yes books too from Amazon. Plus I love it for online movie and tv show rentals/buy. It has a more current slections than Hulu.com. If you haven't checked out Amazon in awhile, you should take a look.

I love Amazon.com. They offer excellent promotions. I always compare prices, so I don't just buy from Amazon because they offer free shipping. I have liked the fact that they offer excellent products and the fast free shipping is a bonus. I also like the fact I can read reviews of products.  I repeat, I always compare prices.

love this site. ordered many things from this site. you can read reviews about this site and their products. there are many places within amazon to buy things,( i mean you can choose from who u buy that item and some prices may be cheap or expensive) excellent site to buy things from, pretty much anything

I've shopped from here several times and each time has been a good experience. I can track my orders and they've all been on time. My products have all been exactly what I've ordered. I will be using them again.!

I adore Amazon. From 1 click shopping, to the extensive reviews of sellers, to the competitive pricing- it's hard not to do all my online shopping here. I've had great experiences with Amazon, and when one of their sellers did not come through on a product for me, Amazon was extremely helpful.

This is my all time favorite website because you can actually find everyything under the sun, which is their slogan. I can shop for housewares, clothes, books, cds, movies and eveything. The website is easy to navigate and I always have great experiences with receiving the merchandise.

Always a good shopping experience. I choose to look here first because the service is like no other. The orders always arrive sooner than expected and I am feel secure knowing that I can track the packages. This is what you look for in an online store.

always check here first. The best deals can be found here. If you're ordering from a seller the shipping can be a little slow but I've been an Amazon shopper for year and have never had a problem. they continue to be the best in my mind.

I have used Amazon for years - and I have no major complaints. It's an OK site and usually the prices are very competative. Nothing is perfect but Amazon is near enough for me. one click shopping what more can you ask for! Purchased all my Christmast gifts last year from Amazon and i will be doing the same this year. LOVE AMAZON!
Amazon has it or you don't need it. They ship fast. Offer good products at good prices ship, packed well and are reliable and have kept me totally satisfied for several years.

Amazon.com is one of the best sites I have ever dealt with. The refund for fo 76 dollars. Combined with their great products and stuff like this amazon is one of the greates sites on the web today. Amazon is a website for the masses. It allows for people to buy just about anything and everything. I have used the site to purchase numerous items and have yet to be disappointed. The website itself is simple enough for the most unintelligent person to navigate it. While offering a broad range of offerings to the table. Amazon in my eyes outshines any other site that rivals it because of it's ability to help people sell their stuff in stores within amazon. The checkout process is quick and painless and the shipping process is above average for a website of it's size with super saver shipping to allow for the customer to save on shipping. The one thing I like the most is the ability to buy used over new stuff to save money and if the item is not what you wanted you can return it with out hassle. I give Amazon 4 stars for being one of the leading websites for the shopper in all of us.

Amazon.com can be a great place to shop for a wide variety of products. Their inventory is rooted from a vast number of suppliers and probably more often than not you're actually dealing with them more-so with amazon being a middle-man. At least, it seems that way to me. And so, Amazon.com can be a great place to buy things -- even toys. However, the prices for such items can be a bit on the high-end depending on the product.  Prices can vary from "new" or even "used". Where toys are concerned, the prices can be ludicrous depending on when it was issued. Toys that were issued yester-year may be on the limited-side and will have their prices inflated. Sometimes you can surf through the various vendors that a particular product is catered from, sifting through their prices. Something to be mindful of is that one vendor may appear to be cheaper, but their shipping is higher. Like ebay, you want to check on the feedback of the seller. Believe of not, even they can disappoint at times. It's rare, but I've had it happen. Sometimes similar looking products can be mixed up and that whole bag. It's not something to be worried about, but aware of what you're prodding at. So, if you're wishing to acquire that particular item or get a price feel for something, amazon.com can be a good place to scope out along with your other web surfing 'ventures.

I have probably order over 50 times from amazon in the last 10 years and have never had any problems with any orders. Never been shipped any wrong items (once was shipped the same item twice for a single order which customer service told me not to worry about it) and orders always arrive in a timely fashion. Don't be scared about the delivery time frame for items with their super saver free shipping option -- it usually arrives before they say. Only opt for the overnight / 2nd day shipping options if you absolutely need to have the item in hand by a certain date. Be aware that if you buy items from amazon stores / sellers, those items won't qualify for free shipping, although the shipping is usually quite reasonable. With amazon sellers, the items can come a little slower, so if possible I usually opt to get items from amazon themselves.
i buy just about everything for my entertainment ... somethings i've bought were as cheap as 1 cent..... i don't think i've ever spent more then 30 dollars on one item there before...
I have been using/shopping at Amazon.com for several years. I LOVE it! I almost always go to Amazon first when looking for books or music. Their prices and shipping times are amazing!
Always spot-on. They have sooo much to offer, and much with free shipping. Extremely fast shipping as items come from a warehouse close to you. No sales tax in CA, either. :)
I have never had a problem with amazon.com, they are amazing and actually ship things when they say they are going to.

Who doesn't love Amazon.com? They have almost every product on the entire earth and ship very fast. The business intelligence feature of the site provides you with additional products you may be interested in or what other people have purchased.  I bought a digital video camera and paired it with the perfect tripod for cheap! I read online that the Amazon.com profit margin is somewhere between 1.5 - 3% on each item that they sell. This is how they are able to offer such low prices on everything. Big time amazon fan and a prime member. Highly recommend the site to purchase almost anything you need.

I have bought a lot of books from Amazon. Good think about them is that you can then turn around and sell the book when you are done. I actually made a few dollars. Better then DISCOUNT BOOK SALE (http://www.discountbooksale.com/) - stay away from them!
100% refunds always. Prompt and courteous. Best place to buy.
the best site to shop on, and even if you don't buy it here, the research will save you money. I always start here so I know what the real price of something is.
this website offers products sold by them or through them from other websites. I would recommend ordering products sold by Amazon, because if there is a problem then it is quicly corrected by Amazon.
Amazon is web shopping done right. I've never had an issue that couldn't be easily resolved and the prices are almost always great.
I have never had a problem Amazon. They are quick to deliver a product and offer daily deals.
I have bought from amazon.com in the past...I have nothing bad to say about them. They always get my orders right and my books have typically arrived earlier than estimated.
Very professional

I have ordered books from Amazon several times. Every time they offered me nice shopping experience. It seems their website can guess what I am thinking and present the information right when I need them! They saved me a lot of time and money and I have no choice but continue to buy from them.

Absolutely fantastic! I got lots of cheap cd's and DVD box sets here....great value if you are hunting for a particular artist, I'd say --- Just recieved some CD's that I've been hunting for ages, I saved a fortune! Much better than HMV stores anyday
Best MP3 store on the planet - best selection and best quality without drm

I LOVE amazon.com, which I can't say for a lot of websites, especially commercial ones where I find it hard entrusting my credit card information! Basically, Amazon.com is a fun, safe, and easy-to-use place that remains huge and popular, so I always feel assured it's reputable and other people have used it to their satisfaction. This store sells many, many products that anyone can need or want. So far I've bought books, including countless textbooks for when I was in college; music CDs and downloads; movie DVDs (including downloads straight to my computer); at least 3 headphones; special personal products that I couldn't find in stores; and I'm sure more than I can think of right now. The first reason I used this site was its reliability. I learned that they worked as a broker with some of the most dependable third-party online sellers on the planet. That means they do their research on the sellers so I don't have. All I do is look at the sellers' star ratings without having to look to bbb.org. Second, I used this site because of their consistent offer of the lowest prices that I still cannot match with other sites, no matter how hard I try, (which is a good relief when you have to buy expensive supplies in college!) Also, they have multiple payment options. Sometimes I don't have my credit card handy, so I use the bank account number that they already have stored (and safely stored, too). Another HUGE highlight of Amazon is the extra information they give on the lower half of the product page that helps the customer make the perfect purchase, such as the customer reviews, discussion areas, and recommendations. I've avoided a lot of bad purchases just by reading Amazon's reviews alone. The special features go further. I have also taken advantage of their Free Super Saver Shipping on qualified products over $25 and at least one of their gift cards. One card I printed out at the last minute when I forgot to buy a real gift!  As a seller, I've had great success getting rid of unwanted textbooks, music CDs, and a keyboard stand, without paying for a listing like on other sites. I did not make large profits off of all my sales, but that's only because Amazon offers extremely low prices. But I've still sold them to an extremely large pool of eager buyers all over the world.  Amazon keeps me interested in the product that I'm buying and coming back for more. Sometimes I look on the site just for the product reviews or recommendations. I've stuck with this site for years now and I hope that I won't have to give it up anytime soon.

No wonder Amazon is the number one shopping website in the world. I like how they let other seller offer their products on amazon.com too next to Amazon's own product... this is how every website should be... fair and honest !

I shop amazon for many many things. I'm always amazed at what you can find. The prices are always lower than what you get in stores. Of course, you HAVE TO BE CAREFUL about third party sellers. I see reviews saying they are never shopping at amazon again because of a third party seller ripping them off. RESEARCH THE SELLERS and make sure you have contact information! I, fortunately, have never had a problem, and have bought plenty from third parties. But I'm always careful and hesitant. Amazon as a whole has great product, great prices, and great customer service. Especially from their own selection instead of third party. A buyer always has responsibility. It's the same with any website. I have refunded things and never had a problem. I've gotten my money back quickly and without delay or problem. If you're looking for something cheaper than what the price is in stores, chances are amazon has it. Great deals on books, dvds, blu-rays, and plenty of other things as well.
I love Amazon.com. I frequent their site ofter. My orders are always on time and always packaged properly.
I buy everything from Amazon. They are usually really accomodating when things go wrong and everything is cheaper than buying in stores.
I really love Amazon. Their prices are always competitive.

What wouldn't I buy on amazon?! This is the first place I stop before purchasing anything. In my experience, amazon has pretty decent customer service if you can find the phone number. There were several times that the item I purchased dropped in price and I was able to get a credit for my next purchase. I purchased amazon prime this year and I'm hooked. Most of my packages come in exactly 2 days! For all the negative reviews of specific amazon sellers, although I haven't had a negative experience, I urge them to try to stick to products which have 'sold by amazon.com' in the description. Make sure to post a negative review for the seller on amazon, because I believe amazon kicks them off after several bad reviews.

Onine buying - This is a great site to buy cheap books and music. It also has electronics, great camera bundles, and more. If you want to know more, just check it out. You will not be disappointed!!! I Pormise!

Amazon puts me at ease - Amazon has been a place which I started buying books from years ago, then graduated to music. Since 2007, I've been purchasing photo stuff from them. Today, I recieved a lens which I ordered last week, but the lens for some reason didnt communicate with my Canon XSi, got error messages. This is the first time ever that I had an issue with anything I got from Amazon directly or their vendors.  I was a bit anxious about what might transpire now that I've received this item and it needs to be replaced. So, I started with their HELP pages for returns or credit, and an online email to them resulted in a reply within an hour stating that a new lens would be sent right away and that if I click on a web page which they gave, I could print out a free UPS shipping label to return the defective part.  Since this is my first time ever having to deal with Amazon on a return, I have to say, its very impressive to see them respond so quickly and so positively without hassle or long protracted letter writing and phone calls. My return is repacked ready to be dropped off at a UPS store or drop box, and my replacement lens has been shipped with a tracking number. They sent it at "2nd Day Air" with no charge to me.  That is how businesses should conduct themselves and not make life miserable for a customer who is justified in returning a defective product.  I am very impressed by Amazon, and if all turns out well as it seems to be, I will coninue to do business with them and will recommend them to others as well.
